name: Pew Pew (anderslbergh)
description:
Fully randomly generated game, inspired by a galaxy far far away.

Start from your landing spot. Fight your way to the checkpoints. Locate your Ship. Avoid death while doing so. 

Optimized for gamepad

controls:

  • X button (square on PS controller): Join Fight
  • Right trigger : Fire
  • Right shoulder: Missiles
  • Right stick:  rotate player
  • Left stick: move player

There's no quit.. 

Unlimited multiplayer players. The only limit is the controller count. 

disclaimer: Characters, locations, sound and other assets in the game are based on things owned by others. I do not sell this and this game is purely for game-dev fun and will never make any money on this game.
